title: BRIEF-India's Solara Made API For Aussie Ranitidine Batches Found To Have Acceptable NDMA Levels
text:
BRIEF-India's Solara Made API For Aussie Ranitidine Batches Found To Have Acceptable NDMA Levels

Stock Markets 21 minutes ago (Oct 23, 2019 20:42)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Solara Made API For Aussie Ranitidine Batches Found To Have Acceptable NDMA Levels Oct 23 (Reuters) - Solara Active Pharma Sciences Ltd : * ALL 24 BATCHES OF RANITIDINE FOUND BY AUSTRALIAN AUTHORITIES TO CONTAIN NDMA WERE PRODUCED USING SOLARA'S API * THE 24 BATCHES OF RANITIDINE WERE FOUND TO HAVE LEVELS OF NDMA WITHIN ACCEPTABLE LIMIT OF 0.3 PPM

BRIEF-India's Solara Made API For Aussie Ranitidine Batches Found To Have Acceptable NDMA Levels
description: BRIEF-India's Solara Made API For Aussie Ranitidine Batches Found To Have Acceptable NDMA Levels
